original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: "Russian authorities have dismantled a Western-trained Ukrainian sabotage group planning attacks on Russian infrastructure, resulting in the death of three operatives and the capture of three others, including the group's commander. The group, supervised by Ukraine's military intelligence, was reportedly trained with the involvement of Western intelligence officers from multiple countries."</s>
